hints.label: lem-zscore-third-derivative
hints.title: k-Uniform Third Derivative of Z-Score
hints.content:
763: :label: lem-zscore-third-derivative
764: 
765: The Z-score $Z_\rho^{(i)} := Z_\rho[f_k, d, x_i]$ satisfies:
766: 
767: $$
768: \|\nabla^3_{x_i} Z_\rho^{(i)}\| \le K_{Z,3}(\rho)
769: $$
770: 
771: where $K_{Z,3}(\rho)$ is a k-uniform constant:
772: 
773: $$
774: \begin{aligned}
775: K_{Z,3}(\rho) := &\, \frac{1}{\sigma\'_{\min}} \Big[C_{u,\nabla^3}(\rho) + 3 C_{u,\nabla}(\rho) C_{v,\nabla^2}(\rho) \\
776: &\quad + 3 C_{u,\nabla^2}(\rho) C_{v,\nabla}(\rho) + 6 C_{u,\nabla}(\rho) (C_{v,\nabla}(\rho))^2 \\
777: &\quad + (d_{\max} + C_{\mu,\nabla}(\rho)) C_{v,\nabla^3}(\rho) \Big]
778: \end{aligned}
779: $$
780: 
781: where:
782: - $u(x_i) := d(x_i) - \mu_\rho^{(i)}$ (numerator)
783: - $v(x_i) := \sigma'_{\rho}^{(i)}$ (denominator)
784: - $C_{u,\nabla^m}(\rho)$ are bounds on $\nabla^m u$ (from measurement and mean)
785: - $C_{v,\nabla^m}(\rho)$ are bounds on $\nabla^m v$ (from Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-patch-third-derivative`)
hints.raw_directive:
760: The Z-score $Z_\rho[f_k, d, x_i] = (d(x_i) - \mu_\rho^{(i)}) / \sigma'_{\rho}^{(i)}$ is a quotient of smooth functions. We now compute its third derivative.
761: 
762: :::{prf:lemma} k-Uniform Third Derivative of Z-Score
763: :label: lem-zscore-third-derivative
764: 
765: The Z-score $Z_\rho^{(i)} := Z_\rho[f_k, d, x_i]$ satisfies:
766: 
767: $$
768: \|\nabla^3_{x_i} Z_\rho^{(i)}\| \le K_{Z,3}(\rho)
769: $$
770: 
771: where $K_{Z,3}(\rho)$ is a k-uniform constant:
772: 
773: $$
774: \begin{aligned}
775: K_{Z,3}(\rho) := &\, \frac{1}{\sigma\'_{\min}} \Big[C_{u,\nabla^3}(\rho) + 3 C_{u,\nabla}(\rho) C_{v,\nabla^2}(\rho) \\
776: &\quad + 3 C_{u,\nabla^2}(\rho) C_{v,\nabla}(\rho) + 6 C_{u,\nabla}(\rho) (C_{v,\nabla}(\rho))^2 \\
777: &\quad + (d_{\max} + C_{\mu,\nabla}(\rho)) C_{v,\nabla^3}(\rho) \Big]
778: \end{aligned}
779: $$
780: 
781: where:
782: - $u(x_i) := d(x_i) - \mu_\rho^{(i)}$ (numerator)
783: - $v(x_i) := \sigma'_{\rho}^{(i)}$ (denominator)
784: - $C_{u,\nabla^m}(\rho)$ are bounds on $\nabla^m u$ (from measurement and mean)
785: - $C_{v,\nabla^m}(\rho)$ are bounds on $\nabla^m v$ (from Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-patch-third-derivative`)
786:

hints.label: unlabeled-proof-31
hints.content:
790: :::{prf:proof}
791: 
792: **Step 1: Quotient rule for third derivative.**
793: 
794: For the quotient $Z = u/v$ where $u = d(x_i) - \mu_\rho^{(i)}$ and $v = \sigma'_{\rho}^{(i)}$, the third derivative is:
795: 
796: $$
797: \nabla^3 Z = \frac{1}{v} \left[\nabla^3 u - 3 \frac{\nabla u \otimes \nabla^2 v}{v} - 3 \frac{\nabla^2 u \otimes \nabla v}{v} + 6 \frac{\nabla u \otimes (\nabla v)^2}{v^2} - \frac{u \nabla^3 v}{v}\right] + O(v^{-4})
798: $$
799: 
800: The $O(v^{-4})$ terms involve higher powers of $1/v$ with lower-order derivatives.
801: 
802: **Step 2: Bounds on numerator derivatives.**
803: 
804: The numerator is $u(x_i) = d(x_i) - \mu_\rho^{(i)}$.
805: 
806: **First derivative:**
807: 
808: $$
809: \nabla u = \nabla d(x_i) - \nabla \mu_\rho^{(i)}
810: $$
811: 
812: Bound:
813: 
814: $$
815: \|\nabla u\| \le d'_{\max} + C_{\mu,\nabla}(\rho) =: C_{u,\nabla}(\rho)
816: $$
817: 
818: **Second derivative:**
819: 
820: $$
821: \nabla^2 u = \nabla^2 d(x_i) - \nabla^2 \mu_\rho^{(i)}
822: $$
823: 
824: Bound:
825: 
826: $$
827: \|\nabla^2 u\| \le d''_{\max} + C_{\mu,\nabla^2}(\rho) =: C_{u,\nabla^2}(\rho)
828: $$
829: 
830: **Third derivative:**
831: 
832: $$
833: \nabla^3 u = \nabla^3 d(x_i) - \nabla^3 \mu_\rho^{(i)}
834: $$
835: 
836: Bound (using Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-mean-third-derivative`):
837: 
838: $$
839: \|\nabla^3 u\| \le d'''_{\max} + C_{\mu,\nabla^3}(\rho) =: C_{u,\nabla^3}(\rho)
840: $$
841: 
842: **Step 3: Bounds on denominator derivatives.**
843: 
844: The denominator is $v(x_i) = \sigma'_{\rho}^{(i)} = \sigma\'_{\text{reg}}(V_\rho^{(i)})$.
845: 
846: **Lower bound (crucial):**
847: 
848: $$
849: v(x_i) \ge \sigma\'_{\min} > 0
850: $$
851: 
852: This comes from Assumption {prf:ref}`assump-c3-patch` and ensures all powers of $1/v$ are bounded.
853: 
854: **First derivative:**
855: 
856: $$
857: \|\nabla v\| \le C_{v,\nabla}(\rho) := L_{\sigma\'_{\text{reg}}} \cdot C_{V,\nabla}(\rho)
858: $$
859: 
860: **Second derivative:**
861: 
862: $$
863: \|\nabla^2 v\| \le C_{v,\nabla^2}(\rho) := L_{\sigma\'\'_{\text{reg}}} \cdot (C_{V,\nabla}(\rho))^2 + L_{\sigma\'_{\text{reg}}} \cdot C_{V,\nabla^2}(\rho)
864: $$
865: 
866: **Third derivative (from Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-patch-third-derivative`):**
867: 
868: $$
869: \|\nabla^3 v\| \le C_{v,\nabla^3}(\rho)
870: $$
871: 
872: **Step 4: Bound each term in the quotient rule.**
873: 
874: **Term 1:** $|\nabla^3 u / v|$
875: 
876: $$
877: \left\|\frac{\nabla^3 u}{v}\right\| \le \frac{C_{u,\nabla^3}(\rho)}{\sigma\'_{\min}}
878: $$
879: 
880: **Term 2:** $|3\nabla u \otimes \nabla^2 v / v^2|$
881: 
882: $$
883: \left\|\frac{3\nabla u \otimes \nabla^2 v}{v^2}\right\| \le \frac{3 C_{u,\nabla}(\rho) \cdot C_{v,\nabla^2}(\rho)}{(\sigma\'_{\min})^2}
884: $$
885: 
886: **Term 3:** $|3\nabla^2 u \otimes \nabla v / v^2|$
887: 
888: $$
889: \left\|\frac{3\nabla^2 u \otimes \nabla v}{v^2}\right\| \le \frac{3 C_{u,\nabla^2}(\rho) \cdot C_{v,\nabla}(\rho)}{(\sigma\'_{\min})^2}
890: $$
891: 
892: **Term 4:** $|6\nabla u \otimes (\nabla v)^2 / v^3|$
893: 
894: $$
895: \left\|\frac{6\nabla u \otimes (\nabla v)^2}{v^3}\right\| \le \frac{6 C_{u,\nabla}(\rho) \cdot (C_{v,\nabla}(\rho))^2}{(\sigma\'_{\min})^3}
896: $$
897: 
898: **Term 5:** $|u \nabla^3 v / v^2|$
899: 
900: Using $|u| = |d(x_i) - \mu_\rho^{(i)}| \le d_{\max} + C_{\mu,\nabla}(\rho)$:
901: 
902: $$
903: \left\|\frac{u \nabla^3 v}{v^2}\right\| \le \frac{(d_{\max} + C_{\mu,\nabla}(\rho)) \cdot C_{v,\nabla^3}(\rho)}{(\sigma\'_{\min})^2}
904: $$
905: 
906: **Step 5: Combine terms.**
907: 
908: Summing all contributions and extracting the dominant factor $1/\sigma\'_{\min}$:
909: 
910: $$
911: K_{Z,3}(\rho) = \frac{1}{\sigma\'_{\min}} \left[C_{u,\nabla^3}(\rho) + 3 C_{u,\nabla}(\rho) C_{v,\nabla^2}(\rho) + 3 C_{u,\nabla^2}(\rho) C_{v,\nabla}(\rho) + 6 C_{u,\nabla}(\rho) (C_{v,\nabla}(\rho))^2 + (d_{\max} + C_{\mu,\nabla}(\rho)) C_{v,\nabla^3}(\rho)\right]
912: $$
913: 
914: (Here we've absorbed factors of $1/\sigma\'_{\min}$ from higher powers of $v$ into the leading factor.)
915: 
916: **Step 6: k-uniformity.**
hints.raw_directive:
788: :::
789: 
790: :::{prf:proof}
791: 
792: **Step 1: Quotient rule for third derivative.**
793: 
794: For the quotient $Z = u/v$ where $u = d(x_i) - \mu_\rho^{(i)}$ and $v = \sigma'_{\rho}^{(i)}$, the third derivative is:
795: 
796: $$
797: \nabla^3 Z = \frac{1}{v} \left[\nabla^3 u - 3 \frac{\nabla u \otimes \nabla^2 v}{v} - 3 \frac{\nabla^2 u \otimes \nabla v}{v} + 6 \frac{\nabla u \otimes (\nabla v)^2}{v^2} - \frac{u \nabla^3 v}{v}\right] + O(v^{-4})
798: $$
799: 
800: The $O(v^{-4})$ terms involve higher powers of $1/v$ with lower-order derivatives.
801: 
802: **Step 2: Bounds on numerator derivatives.**
803: 
804: The numerator is $u(x_i) = d(x_i) - \mu_\rho^{(i)}$.
805: 
806: **First derivative:**
807: 
808: $$
809: \nabla u = \nabla d(x_i) - \nabla \mu_\rho^{(i)}
810: $$
811: 
812: Bound:
813: 
814: $$
815: \|\nabla u\| \le d'_{\max} + C_{\mu,\nabla}(\rho) =: C_{u,\nabla}(\rho)
816: $$
817: 
818: **Second derivative:**
819: 
820: $$
821: \nabla^2 u = \nabla^2 d(x_i) - \nabla^2 \mu_\rho^{(i)}
822: $$
823: 
824: Bound:
825: 
826: $$
827: \|\nabla^2 u\| \le d''_{\max} + C_{\mu,\nabla^2}(\rho) =: C_{u,\nabla^2}(\rho)
828: $$
829: 
830: **Third derivative:**
831: 
832: $$
833: \nabla^3 u = \nabla^3 d(x_i) - \nabla^3 \mu_\rho^{(i)}
834: $$
835: 
836: Bound (using Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-mean-third-derivative`):
837: 
838: $$
839: \|\nabla^3 u\| \le d'''_{\max} + C_{\mu,\nabla^3}(\rho) =: C_{u,\nabla^3}(\rho)
840: $$
841: 
842: **Step 3: Bounds on denominator derivatives.**
843: 
844: The denominator is $v(x_i) = \sigma'_{\rho}^{(i)} = \sigma\'_{\text{reg}}(V_\rho^{(i)})$.
845: 
846: **Lower bound (crucial):**
847: 
848: $$
849: v(x_i) \ge \sigma\'_{\min} > 0
850: $$
851: 
852: This comes from Assumption {prf:ref}`assump-c3-patch` and ensures all powers of $1/v$ are bounded.
853: 
854: **First derivative:**
855: 
856: $$
857: \|\nabla v\| \le C_{v,\nabla}(\rho) := L_{\sigma\'_{\text{reg}}} \cdot C_{V,\nabla}(\rho)
858: $$
859: 
860: **Second derivative:**
861: 
862: $$
863: \|\nabla^2 v\| \le C_{v,\nabla^2}(\rho) := L_{\sigma\'\'_{\text{reg}}} \cdot (C_{V,\nabla}(\rho))^2 + L_{\sigma\'_{\text{reg}}} \cdot C_{V,\nabla^2}(\rho)
864: $$
865: 
866: **Third derivative (from Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-patch-third-derivative`):**
867: 
868: $$
869: \|\nabla^3 v\| \le C_{v,\nabla^3}(\rho)
870: $$
871: 
872: **Step 4: Bound each term in the quotient rule.**
873: 
874: **Term 1:** $|\nabla^3 u / v|$
875: 
876: $$
877: \left\|\frac{\nabla^3 u}{v}\right\| \le \frac{C_{u,\nabla^3}(\rho)}{\sigma\'_{\min}}
878: $$
879: 
880: **Term 2:** $|3\nabla u \otimes \nabla^2 v / v^2|$
881: 
882: $$
883: \left\|\frac{3\nabla u \otimes \nabla^2 v}{v^2}\right\| \le \frac{3 C_{u,\nabla}(\rho) \cdot C_{v,\nabla^2}(\rho)}{(\sigma\'_{\min})^2}
884: $$
885: 
886: **Term 3:** $|3\nabla^2 u \otimes \nabla v / v^2|$
887: 
888: $$
889: \left\|\frac{3\nabla^2 u \otimes \nabla v}{v^2}\right\| \le \frac{3 C_{u,\nabla^2}(\rho) \cdot C_{v,\nabla}(\rho)}{(\sigma\'_{\min})^2}
890: $$
891: 
892: **Term 4:** $|6\nabla u \otimes (\nabla v)^2 / v^3|$
893: 
894: $$
895: \left\|\frac{6\nabla u \otimes (\nabla v)^2}{v^3}\right\| \le \frac{6 C_{u,\nabla}(\rho) \cdot (C_{v,\nabla}(\rho))^2}{(\sigma\'_{\min})^3}
896: $$
897: 
898: **Term 5:** $|u \nabla^3 v / v^2|$
899: 
900: Using $|u| = |d(x_i) - \mu_\rho^{(i)}| \le d_{\max} + C_{\mu,\nabla}(\rho)$:
901: 
902: $$
903: \left\|\frac{u \nabla^3 v}{v^2}\right\| \le \frac{(d_{\max} + C_{\mu,\nabla}(\rho)) \cdot C_{v,\nabla^3}(\rho)}{(\sigma\'_{\min})^2}
904: $$
905: 
906: **Step 5: Combine terms.**
907: 
908: Summing all contributions and extracting the dominant factor $1/\sigma\'_{\min}$:
909: 
910: $$
911: K_{Z,3}(\rho) = \frac{1}{\sigma\'_{\min}} \left[C_{u,\nabla^3}(\rho) + 3 C_{u,\nabla}(\rho) C_{v,\nabla^2}(\rho) + 3 C_{u,\nabla^2}(\rho) C_{v,\nabla}(\rho) + 6 C_{u,\nabla}(\rho) (C_{v,\nabla}(\rho))^2 + (d_{\max} + C_{\mu,\nabla}(\rho)) C_{v,\nabla^3}(\rho)\right]
912: $$
913: 
914: (Here we've absorbed factors of $1/\sigma\'_{\min}$ from higher powers of $v$ into the leading factor.)
915: 
916: **Step 6: k-uniformity.**
917:
